outline.text: BY Jerry
From Data to Decision: A Strategic Framework for Analyzing and Predicting Hospital Readmissions

Section 3: Advanced Analytics: Building a Predictive Readmission Risk Model
3.1 The Goal: From Population Rates to Individual Risk
3.2 Feature Engineering: The Building Blocks of Prediction

Section 4: Model Validation and the Interpretability Imperative

4.2 Explainable AI (XAI): Opening the Black Box
Section 5: From Prediction to Action: Operationalizing the Model and Intervening Effectively
5.1 The Deployment Challenge: Bridging the Lab-to-Ward Gap
5.2 A Framework for Risk-Stratified Interventions
5.3 Catalogue of High-Impact Interventions for High-Risk Patients
Conclusion and Strategic Recommendations
4. The multidisciplinary team should make a strategic decision on the initial algorithm, balancing the need for accuracy with the imperative for clinical
